name: Pirate Island: Gears of Fate
description:
2 brothers are marooned on a set of islands with a crossbow, a mechanical gear, and a bunch of sass. Help the brothers solve their mystery of how they got there, why they are there, and why so many monsters are wearing pirate hats, although, let's be honest, everything looks better with a pirate hat on. Solve some mysteries, do some random quests, fight some pirates! All in a day's work on Pirate Island: Gears of Fate.

Built on RPG Maker MV, Pirate Island: Gears of Fate takes a faithful turn on the classic JRPG. Black Mages, Summoners, White Mages, Sentries, monsters wearing pirate hats. It's all here.
